snippet: Just outside Cincinnati, Greg Davis was dialing numbers from a list of ostensibly pro-Republican households when, unexpectedly, he found an Obama supporter at the other end of the line.
abstract: Greg Davis, Mitt Romney's local campaign chairman in Lebanon, Ohio, spars with Obama supporter who he unexpectedly encounters on phone while dialing numbers from list of ostensibly pro-Republican households.
lead_paragraph: Just outside Cincinnati, Greg Davis was dialing numbers from a list of ostensibly pro-Republican households when, unexpectedly, he found an Obama supporter at the other end of the line.

headline.seo: Ohio Canvassers Pitch the Opposition in Calls
headline.main: Ohio Canvassers Pitch the Opposition in Calls
headline.print_headline: The Other End Of the Line
